Package org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.server.resourcefactory

Class JndiComponentResourceFactory

java.lang.Object
org.jboss.resteasy.plugins.server.resourcefactory.JndiComponentResourceFactory
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceFactory
public class JndiComponentResourceFactory extends Object implements ResourceFactory
Used for component jndi-based resources like enterprise beans.

$Revision: 1 $

Bill Burke
